body: Curriculum Materials         Fort Spokane stable   The park offers two different educator's guides about Fort Spokane: A short guide for quick overviews and a much longer and more indepth guide. "A Cultural Crossroads: Fort Spokane Teacher's Guide" is available in print form from the park. To order a copy please contact the park's education specialist by email. The new Fort Spokane Teacher's Guide is available as a download.
title: Lake Roosevelt National Recreation Area: Curriculum Materials
